links.label: Viva Engage Groups Activity Group Detail

params.markdown:
This dashboard provides a focused view of security alerts generated by Microsoft Entra ID Identity Protection. It includes
- Key metrics and trends related to risk detections and sign-in anomalies across your organization
- A detailed breakdown of alert types, severity levels, impacted accounts, and remediation status.
- Contextual information to help security teams investigate suspicious sign-ins and take appropriate actions, such as resetting passwords or enforcing multi-factor authentication (MFA).

It helps you monitor identity risks in real time and strengthen your organization’s security.

[**Integrations Page**](/app/integrations/detail/o365_metrics/overview)
